agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, May 6, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn SB 89 Hall | et al. Relating to a ribbon for certain members of the military forces who served in support of operations to secure the Texas border. SB 822 Nelson Relating to the administration of a grant program to support community mental health programs for veterans and their families. SB 1091 Nichols Relating to vehicles eligible for veteran toll discount programs. SB 1819 Campbell Relating to designating May 8 as Military Spouse Appreciation Day. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
